intents.name: Extract Pricing Information
intents.description: Gathers and organizes pricing details from competitor websites, including product prices, discounts, and special offers.
examples: What are the current prices of competitor products?
Find any discounts or promotions on competitor sites.
List the pricing details of similar products from competitors.

intents.name: Extract Product Features
intents.description: Collects detailed information about product features and specifications from competitor websites.
examples: What features do competitor products offer?
List the specifications of similar products from competitors.
Compare product features between our products and competitors.

intents.name: Extract Customer Reviews
intents.description: Compiles customer reviews and ratings from competitor websites to analyze customer feedback and satisfaction.
examples: What are customers saying about competitor products?
Summarize the reviews for competitor products.
How do customers rate competitor products?

intents.name: Extract Promotional Offers
intents.description: Identifies and lists any promotional offers or deals available on competitor websites.
examples: Are there any current promotions on competitor sites?
List the deals available from competitors.
What special offers are competitors providing?

miniAgents.name: Web Crawler Insights
miniAgents.scope: Utilizes a web crawler tool to extract and organize insights from competitor websites into a structured table format. This includes gathering data on competitor pricing, product features, customer reviews, and promotional offers.
